tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE pharmaceutical_research (
	sample_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	experiment_date DATE,
	researcher_name VARCHAR(50),
	compounds_used VARCHAR(100),
	gene_expression FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE Reports (
 report_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
 report_name VARCHAR(255),
 report_date DATE,
 report_content TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE Dashboards (
 dashboard_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
 dashboard_name VARCHAR(255),
 dashboard_type VARCHAR(50),
 dashboard_owner VARCHAR(100),
 created_date TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE AggregatedData (
 data_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
 report_id UUID,
 dashboard_id UUID,
 aggregation_type VARCHAR(50),
 aggregation_method VARCHAR(50),
 aggregation_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE reports (
 report_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 report_name VARCHAR(255),
 report_type VARCHAR(50),
 report_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE dashboards (
 dashboard_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 dashboard_name VARCHAR(255),
 dashboard_type VARCHAR(50),
 dashboard_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE data_sources (
 source_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 source_name VARCHAR(255),
 source_type VARCHAR(50),
 source_description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE research_projects (
 project_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 project_name VARCHAR(255),
 project_type VARCHAR(50),
 project_start_date DATE,
 project_end_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE Reports (
 report_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 report_name VARCHAR,
 report_type VARCHAR,
 report_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE Users (
 user_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 user_name VARCHAR,
 user_role VARCHAR
)

CREATE TABLE Drugs (
 drug_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 drug_name VARCHAR,
 dosage VARCHAR,
 manufacturer VARCHAR
)

CREATE TABLE Patients (
 patient_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 patient_name VARCHAR,
 age INT,
 gender VARCHAR,
 diagnosis VARCHAR
)

CREATE TABLE ResearchData (
 research_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 drug_id INT,
 patient_id INT,
 report_id INT,
 researcher_name VARCHAR
)
